module.name: assembly_component_placement_requirements
module.keywords: module, electrical, assembly design, placement, component, requirement allocation, component category, restriction, area, volume

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe the constraints restricting where components are to be placed in an assembly. These restrictions may be to keep components within a region, or may be restrictions to keep components out of a region. Module attribute data population is restricted to that related to the discrete assembly view. Module attribute data population is restricted to that related to assemblies with interconnect substrate.

inscope.li: grouping of components for placement purposes;
identification of restriction areas on the interconnect substrate;
identification of restriction volumes in the assembly;
assignment of component groups to restriction areas;
assignment of component groups to restriction volumes;
description of property based component keepout regions on the interconnect substrate;
description of property based component keepin regions on the interconnect substrate;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module with interconnect component, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1643.

outscope.li: component placement restrictions where there is no interconnect substrate component.

aa.refpath: grouped_requirements_property <= group {(group.description = 'nearest boundary') (group.description = 'centroid') (group.description = 'furthest boundary')} group.description
